name: ATC4Real
description:
The most realistic ATC Simulator for iPad. It gathers real flights timetables so you could experience real life action in your radar screen.

You will be able to simulate an air traffic controller shift at the most crowded and challenging airports in the world. More than 60 airports available to play and new ones being published every month, so you could not get bored.

Airports included within the free app:

- San Diego Intl Airport (KSAN / SAN)
San Diego, CA, USA
- Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood Intl Airport (KFLL / FLL)
Fort Lauderdale, FL, USA

----
IN-APP PURCHASES ARE VALID ONLY FOR IOS DEVICES.
License can not be used or shared in other devices and operating systems.
----

All airports are based in real data navigation so you could practice real STARs and SID procedures.

Lead every arrival into the actives runways and clear them to land and guide all departures into their exit fixes.

User manual available at www.atc4real.com

Features:
- ATC4Real simulates approach and departure control, plus take off and landing clearances
- Real flight data gathered from real world timetables
- Timetables are updated by season
- All controls are reachable through gestures (Tap, double tap and drag) so you do not need any keyboard input for main functions
- Separated strips for Arrivals and departures
- Toggle radar screen elements display (Map, rings, navaids, etc)
- Terrain heights simulated, avoid crashing into mountains!
- Fixes, vors and airports are accurate placed so you can practice instrument procedures published for current airport
- Real weather updated every 15 minutes (Requires internet connection)
- Satellite image as background optional
- Radar screen has 2 zoom levels, so you can do precise vectors
- Your score could be saved online so you could be in our top rank chart
- Radar screen area: 90 nm
- Career mode: you will be promoted to new ranks as you progress, unlocking sim features
- In flight emergencies

* This app has been designed for best viewed in iPad devices


So start controlling now!

Visit http://www.atc4real.com for more information, user manual and support.
